alert.note: Alert for Orange; Spotsylvania (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 16 at 5:59PM EDT until July 16 at 6:45PM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sterling Virginia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Orange County in central Virginia... Southwestern Spotsylvania County in central Virginia... * Until 645 PM EDT. * At 559 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles east of Orange, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damaging winds will cause some trees and large branches to fall. This could injure those outdoors, as well as damage homes and vehicles. Roadways may become blocked by downed trees. Localized power outages are possible. Unsecured light objects may become projectiles. * Locations impacted include... Spotsylvania, Mine Run, Rhoadesville, Brokenburg, Parker, Everona, Verdiersville, Locust Grove, Alsop, Gold Dale, Thornhill, Nasons, Logan, Lahore, Glenora, Post Oak, Unionville and Rapidan. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
